betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThe JEI Bee Drop page has two rows.

Drops in the first row will be produced by the corresponding species with no special requirements.

Drops in the second row are specialty drops, and will only drop if a bee's EXACT temperature and humidy and temperature requirements are respected.

This process can be made easier with Gendustry, see the quest for best genes for specialty drops for the no tolerance genes.
